languages.text: Персонаж что нанес урон Скомороху Блефу, Големам или Скульптору ставноиться целью для Скомороха Блефа. Если Скоморох Блеф убил свю цель, следующая цель определяется случайно.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж что нанес урон Скомороху Блефу, Големам или Скульптору ставноиться целью для Скомороха Блефа. Если Скоморох Блеф убил свю цель, следующая цель определяется случайно.

languages.text: The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.
languages.original_text: Последнее существо, которое нанесло {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} Блефу, каменным стражам или Тавриску, становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для Блефа. Если это существо {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, приоритетной целью становится случайный противник.

traits.locale_text: The latest creature that dealt damage to buffoon Bluff, stone guards, or Tavrisk, becomes buffoon Bluff's priority target. If that creature is unconscious, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

languages.text: Kurusıkı'ya, taş nöbetçilere veya Tavrisk'e son {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren yaratık; Kurusıkı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefi{/g} olur. Bu yaratık {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}baygınsa{/g} rastgele bir düşman öncelikli hedef hâline gelir.
languages.original_text: The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

traits.locale_text: Kurusıkı'ya, taş nöbetçilere veya Tavrisk'e son hasar veren yaratık; Kurusıkı'nın öncelikli hedefi olur. Bu yaratık baygınsa rastgele bir düşman öncelikli hedef hâline gelir.

Kurusıkı'ya, taş nöbetçilere veya Tavrisk'e son {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren yaratık; Kurusıkı'nın öncelikli hedefi olur. Bu yaratık baygınsa rastgele bir düşman öncelikli hedef hâline gelir.

languages.text: La última criatura que haya infligido {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a Farol, los centinelas de piedra o a Tavrisk, se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de Farol. Si esa criatura está {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, un enemigo aleatorio se convierte en su objetivo prioritario.
languages.original_text: The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

traits.locale_text: La última criatura que haya infligido daño a Farol, los centinelas de piedra o a Tavrisk, se convierte en el objetivo prioritario de Farol. Si esa criatura está inconsciente, un enemigo aleatorio se convierte en su objetivo prioritario.

languages.text: 最后一个对闹闹、坚石哨卫或塔夫瑞克造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的生物，会成为闹闹的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}。如果该生物处于{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}昏迷{/g}状态，则随机一名敌人会成为闹闹的优先目标。
languages.original_text: The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

traits.locale_text: 最后一个对闹闹、坚石哨卫或塔夫瑞克造成伤害的生物，会成为闹闹的优先目标。如果该生物处于昏迷状态，则随机一名敌人会成为闹闹的优先目标。

languages.text: La dernière créature à avoir infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à Bluff, aux sentinelles de pierre ou à Tavrisk devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de Bluff. Si cette créature est {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}inconsciente{/g}, la cible prioritaire est choisie au hasard parmi les autres ennemis.
languages.original_text: The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

traits.locale_text: La dernière créature à avoir infligé des dégâts à Bluff, aux sentinelles de pierre ou à Tavrisk devient la cible prioritaire de Bluff. Si cette créature est inconsciente, la cible prioritaire est choisie au hasard parmi les autres ennemis.

languages.text: ブラフ、ストーンセンチネル、またはタヴリスクに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた最後の生物はブラフの{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。その生物が{g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}意識不明{/g}になると、ランダムな敵が彼の優先ターゲットになる。
languages.original_text: The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

traits.locale_text: ブラフ、ストーンセンチネル、またはタヴリスクにダメージを与えた最後の生物はブラフの優先ターゲットになる。その生物が意識不明になると、ランダムな敵が彼の優先ターゲットになる。
ブラフ、ストーンセンチネル、またはタヴリスクにダメージを与えた最後の生物はブラフの優先ターゲットになる。その生物が意識不明になると、ランダムな敵が彼の優先ターゲットになる。

languages.text: Die letzte Kreatur, die Bluff, den Steinwächtern oder Tavrisk {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt hat, wird Bluffs {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}. Ist diese Kreatur {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}bewusstlos{/g}, wird ein zufälliger Gegner das Prioritätsziel.
languages.original_text: The last creature that dealt {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to Bluff, the stone sentinels, or Tavrisk, becomes Bluff's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}. If that creature is {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}unconscious{/g}, a random enemy becomes his priority target.

traits.locale_text: Die letzte Kreatur, die Bluff, den Steinwächtern oder Tavrisk Schaden zugefügt hat, wird Bluffs Prioritätsziel. Ist diese Kreatur bewusstlos, wird ein zufälliger Gegner das Prioritätsziel.

Если это существо {g|Encyclopedia:UnconsciousEffect}без сознания{/g}, приоритетной целью становится случайный противник.
